name: LLI Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs used by LouLan Industries.

name: Hall of Fame Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to manufacture certain retired ship classes.

name: Autonomous Mantle Bore (D)
desc:
While it is believed there are no functional control override units remaining in the Sector, the bore itself is capable of independent - if sometimes unpredictable - operation. Automatic-mode failsafes preclude its use on habitable worlds.

This particular bore has suffered permanent damage at some point in its life, further compounded by poor maintenance.

name: Cloning Facility
desc:
The central (albeit poorly-maintained) component of a cloning facility.

Given enough credits, securing a 'donor' for stem cells to use in the cloning process is not difficult. Thanks to AI-assisted alteration of genetic sequences and pre-implanted memories, every clone is unique and are effectively normal human beings - with the same array of civilian and military uses.
